sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT ''Supply'' AS ''EventType''
	  ,''ADF_ManualRefresh'' AS ''EventName''
	  ,''R'' AS ''EventStatus''
	  ,GETDATE() AS ''CreateDateTime''
	  ,''',pipeline().parameters.Refresh,''' AS ''EventParameters''
	  ,''',string(variables('Response')[0].refreshid),''' AS ''RefreshId''')

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT TOP 10 [EventId],[RefreshId] FROM [Controls].[AzureSharedEventQueue]
WHERE [EventType] = 'Supply' AND [EventStatus] = 'R'
ORDER BY [EventId]

SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (
	SELECT * FROM [Controls].[AzureSharedEventQueue]
	WHERE [EventType] = 'Supply' AND [EventStatus] NOT IN ('R','F','C') 
)
THEN 1
ELSE 0 END AS 'InvalidStatus'

SELECT [EventId],[EventName] FROM [Controls].[AzureSharedEventQueue]
WHERE EventType = 'Supply' AND [EventStatus] IS NULL
ORDER BY EventId

SELECT [EventId],[RefreshId] FROM [Controls].[AzureSharedEventQueue]
WHERE [EventType] = 'Supply' AND [EventStatus] = 'R'
ORDER BY [EventId]

statusMessage.value: Cancelled due to request by user.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (
	SELECT * FROM [Controls].[AzureSharedEventQueue]
	WHERE [EventType] = 'Supply' AND [EventStatus] = 'R'
)
THEN 1
ELSE 0 END AS 'Running'

SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (
	SELECT * FROM [Controls].[AzureSharedEventQueue]
	WHERE [EventType] = 'Supply' AND ([EventStatus] = 'R' OR [EventStatus] IS NULL)
)
THEN 0
ELSE 1 END AS 'Idle'
